title: Happening Folks
synopsis: This page is maintained as the directory of participants of the course. Visit this page to load Happening participants into your neighborhood.

title: Mark Johnstone
synopsis: Mark has eclectic tastes, likes to start MOOCs but rarely finishes them, and is interested in student autonomy and self-directed and collaborative learning.

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.
